div.div:
COVID-19 ClosureAll schools will be closed for the duration of the public health emergency, as stated by Governor Evers.
Updates can be found at: www.ecasd.us/COVID-19.
For At-Home Learning Resources, Checklists and resources, go to: www.ecasd.us/at-home-learning

500 Main Street
Eau Claire, WI 54701-3770

For assistance in another language/Si Ud. necesita ayuda, por favor llame Ud. a la escuela de su hijo/a Yog koj xav tau neeg pab txhais cov lus nov, thov hu xov tooj rau call 715-852-3555.
District Accessibility Statement
For assistance or to report an issue with accessibility, call 715-852-3001 or submit a request.
